title: This is Ulster
creator_credit: Richard F. Tambling, Ronald H. Riley and R.H.R. Productions
brief_description: A panorama of Ulster, the northern province of Ireland which forms part of the United Kingdom. Some of the country’s physical characteristics, which bear their own special brand of beauty, form the background to a survey of industrial and rural life. No reference to the simmering poitical issues.
